author: cjolif
msg: remove a debug purpose printStackTrace() call.

author: cjolif
msg: Implement new IntepreterPool API: getInterpreter now takes the Document
in parameter. The interpreter is released when the Document is no longer
used thanks to WeakReferences (for this we should not anymore directly
reference the document in the interpreter but use a WeakReference).
Do small optim when looking for scripting attributes on SVG elements.

author: tkormann
msg: primitiveUnits and filter primitives (the content of the filter element) are now
inherited. xlink:href should be implemented everywhere it's needed.

author: tkormann
msg: implement attribute and content inheritance (using xlink:href) for
gradients and pattern. Filter region and filterUnits are now also inherited.

author: tkormann
msg: - percentages are not relative to the current viewport (including in
clipPath or pattern in objectboundingbox for example.
- examples fixed (paternRegions.svg pattern #3 and #4 looks now different -
which looks good according to patternUnits.
Vincent may need to confirm that
- xlink:href is now handled for pattern children
